segments.text: I see the water just pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating such a mess on the floor, and the woman doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in the puddle, but she's just standing there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware she is of the water overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and it's just going to get worse if she doesn't turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's just really focused on her task or if she's daydreaming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Either way, it's frustrating to watch this happen and not be able to do anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon and realizes what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a bit maddening, to be honest.
segments.speaker: PAR
